description: This file provides helper functions for interacting with sensor endpoints, including extracting resource attributes and checking faulted/bypassed status via resource maps or events.

methods.name: const char * extractResource(icHashMap * map,const char * ownerUri,const char * resourceName)
methods.description: Extracts a resource value from a hash map based on a URI constructed from ownerUri and resourceName.

methods.name: bool isEndpointFaulted(DSEndpoint * endpoint)
methods.description: Checks if an endpoint is faulted by examining its resource map for a 'faulted' status.

methods.name: bool isEndpointFaultedViaEvent(DeviceServiceResourceUpdatedEvent * event)
methods.description: Determines if an endpoint is faulted based on a resource update event.

methods.name: bool isEndpointBypassed(DSEndpoint * endpoint)
methods.description: Checks if an endpoint is bypassed by examining its resource map for a 'bypassed' status.

methods.name: bool isEndpointBypassedViaEvent(DeviceServiceResourceUpdatedEvent * event)
methods.description: Determines if an endpoint is bypassed based on a resource update event.

ctags.name: extractResource
ctags.pattern: /^static const char *extractResource(icHashMap *map, const char *ownerUri, const char *resourceNam/
